paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data from affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The proband (II.2) (Figure 1A and Table 1) was a 72-year-old woman diagnosed with infiltrating ductal carcinoma breast cancer (IDC-BC) at 48 years of age.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a frameshift mutation leading to a premature stop codon.

variants.segregation_data: The husband of the proband (II.1) did not carry any of the PVs.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified in the index case and is associated with breast cancer.
key_quotes: The proband carried two PVs: c.34C>T in the BRCA1 gene that causes a premature stop codon (p.Gln13Ter) and a second frameshift mutation in the BRCA2 gene c.1587delTinsCA (p.Glu532ArgfsTer3).

patients.phenotype: metastatic infiltrating ductal carcinoma breast cancer

individual_records.phenotype_details: metastatic infiltrating ductal carcinoma breast cancer
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The proband was a 67-year-old woman who was referred for genetic testing because she was diagnosed with metastatic IDC-BC in her mid-forties.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a frameshift mutation leading to a premature stop codon.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation was inherited from her father (II.7), who developed metastatic prostate cancer.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified in the proband and is associated with breast cancer.
key_quotes: Molecular analyses revealed that she carried a PV c.5146_5149delTATG (p.Tyr1716LysfsTer8) in the BRCA2 gene.

patients.phenotype: metastatic infiltrating ductal carcinoma breast cancer

individual_records.phenotype_details: metastatic infiltrating ductal carcinoma breast cancer
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The frameshift BRCA2-c.5796_5797delTA (p.His1932GlnfsTer12) variant was also present in the proband.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a frameshift mutation leading to a premature stop codon.

variants.segregation_data: None of the affected relatives have undergone genetic testing so far.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was identified in the proband and is associated with breast cancer.
key_quotes: The frameshift BRCA2-c.5796_5797delTA (p.His1932GlnfsTer12) variant was also present in the proband.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
